author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION THIRTEEN COULD BECOME A HURRICANE IN A COUPLE OF DAYS...
summary:
...TROPICAL DEPRESSION THIRTEEN COULD BECOME A HURRICANE IN A COUPLE OF DAYS...
 As of 8:00 PM CVT Wed Oct 2
 the center of Thirteen was located near 10.5, -29.7
 with movement W at 7 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Thirteen (AT3/AL132024)
